conversation.message:
Dear Student_C,

Thank you for reaching out and for your continued interest. Candidly, our decisions are driven primarily by our fixed priority order, and additional materials or repeated re-applications generally will not move an applicant ahead of higher-priority candidates.

At this point, the only realistic scenario in which we could reconsider is if we reach a later stage and the seat is still unfilled because higher-priority candidates do not apply/are matched elsewhere. Even in that case, we cannot guarantee an offer.

If you would like to remain under consideration, you may continue to check in and/or submit an [APPLY] in a later round; we will respond based on capacity and our priority order at that time.

Sincerely,
School_C Admissions
